Name: Office Harasser
About the game: If you wish to impersonate a rich, unscrupulous young man, this is the game for you! MC is the owner of a renowned company where three beautiful girls work: Tess, Tanya and Allison, each with their own problems and personalities.... But it's not all sunshine and roses; a big deal to be consolidated will require your attention and cunning. Will you be able to bribe the three beautiful employees and seal the contract? Follow the story and make your own choices to find out! Gameplay This is a Visual Novel. During the narrative you will have the opportunity to make different choices, which will lead to different consequences and/or different sexual preferences. Over 1500 images and 35 different animations spiced with sounds and music.
